title: Mechanic
summaries: The Mechanic is an NPC who sells various mechanisms, as well as Wire Cutters and Wrenches, allowing the player to construct and activate wired devices like traps and critter engines. She can be found in the Dungeon in the Cavern layer or below after killing Skeletron, where she spawns randomly as the stationary Bound Mechanic. Talking to her in this state will free her. If the Bound Mechanic is killed, she will still be able to respawn afterwards; if the Mechanic NPC is killed, she will move in again after some time as long as there are vacant houses.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, [img:Mobile version] Mobile, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader versions, the Mechanic will attack nearby enemies. She will throw her Combat Wrench / Wrench like a boomerang to defend herself, dealing 11 / 16 / 19 damage at the start of the game, and (on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version) as players progress she will gain various stat increases. Also on [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, she may also drop this weapon upon death.
The Bound Mechanic is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer or its upgrades.
